summary: A man experiences a supernatural occurrence at his newly purchased apartment; a soap opera being telecast exclusively on his TV, which shows the future of his family.
cast: Madhavan|Neetu Chandra|Poonam Dhillon|Saranya Ponvannan|Sachin Khedekar|Ravi Babu|Sampath Raj|Murli Sharma|Amar Upadhyay|Deepak Dobriyal|Vinay Jain|Dhritiman Chatterjee|Suhasini Mulay|V. Balakrishnan|Meera Vasudevan|Sanjaih Bokaria|Divesh K. Sharma|Iswar Srikumar
title: 13B: Fear Has a New Address
